snippet.title: Thea 2: The Shattering launch trailer.
snippet.description:
A rat with a dream!
There are many stories in Thea, what will yours be?

Thea 2: The Shattering- a turn based strategy/4X, RPG, survival game with card game mechanics, set in a dark fantasy world inspired by Slavic mythology and folklore.

Game launch: May 13th 2019!

Check out our Steam page: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/606230/Thea_2_The_Shattering/

Join us on Discord: 

https://discord.gg/DTZcGbu
